head.title: Pace Offers Workshops On Computer Skills

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: Pace Offers Workshops On Computer Skills

abstract.p: Pace Computer Learning Center in White Plains, NY, is offering noncredit computer workshops for adults interested in honing their computer skills (S)

block.p: Adults interested in honing their computer skills can register for noncredit computer workshops at the Pace Computer Learning Center at 1 Martine Avenue in White Plains.
Forty continuing courses, from the most basic to the most advanced, are available at the center from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., Monday through Friday.
Adults interested in honing their computer skills can register for noncredit computer workshops at the Pace Computer Learning Center at 1 Martine Avenue in White Plains.
Forty continuing courses, from the most basic to the most advanced, are available at the center from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., Monday through Friday.
Corporations can buy a block of training days for employees or arrange to have customized workshops at the center. The number to call for more information or to register is (914) 422-4328.
